name: Bomb Defuser (DogoBweadz)
description:
Bomb Defuser is a platformer game that has the player going through the same level collecting coins, there's a bomb that has a 60 second timer and when it goes off  the player will die (the player can also die from spikes and missiles) once the player dies they can purchase upgrades such as Double Jump, +1 Health Upgrade, and Speed. The player will need to use the upgrades to collect Water Buckets scattered around the level (2) and use them to get to the bomb and deactivate it. This is my first game and game jam so I encourage you to play through this! I made this using the free version of construct 3 so I was pretty limited and there really isn't much to do, but if you do end up liking it give me feed back!

Controls:

WASD + Space
